text:
Happy Monday everyone! I've just prepared the spreadsheet for our initiative :point_right: <https://docs.google.com/spreadsheets/d/1druyM4umh30dCe4QkW0gChtj7iKuFsBwpAjNCmEAWhw/edit?usp=sharing>

Atm, it's open to everyone and you can add new worksheets or suggest edits. Any topic is welcome, just make sure you create a relevant worsheet for your content. Let's see how it moves on, and we might want to restrict access in the future.

Also, to keep it up-to-date and ensure everyone gets a piece of the pie, we might need to update the spreadsheet (remove old publications, push new ones to the top).

I'll be happy to hear your thoughts and ideas that will help us improve the flow!!
